foreignData.name: Kühner Ritter
foreignData.text:
Flankenangriff
{1}{W}: Jede Kreatur ohne Flankenangriff, die den Kühnen Ritter blockt, erhält -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur einmal pro Zug.

name: Knight of Valor
originalText:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking is assigned to block this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
o1oo
W Each creature without flanking blocking Knight of Valor gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Use this ability only once each turn.

rulings.text: The second ability is not Flanking and is not removed by an effect that removes Flanking.

text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}: Each creature without flanking blocking Knight of Valor gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
